main.missing-moduleconf: Missing moduleConfig-file. Automatically disabling all modules and overwriting modules.json later
main.login-error: Bot could not log in. Error: %e
main.login-error-token: Bot could not log in because the provided token is invalid. Please update your token.
main.login-error-intents: Bot could not log in because the intents were not enabled correctly. Please enable "PRESENCE INTENT", "SERVER MEMBERS INTENT" and "MESSAGE CONTENT INTENT" in your Discord-Developer-Dashboard: %url
main.not-invited: Please invite the bot to your guild before continuing: %inv
main.logged-in: Bot logged in as %tag and is now online.
main.logchannel-wrong-type: There is no Log-Channel set or it has the wrong type (only text-channels are supported).
main.config-check-failed: Configuration-Check failed. You can find more information in your log. The bot exited.
main.bot-ready: The bot initiated successfully and is now listening to commands
main.no-command-permissions: Could not update guild commands. Please give us permissions to performe this critical action: %inv
main.command-no-sync-required: Application commands are up to date - no syncing required
main.channel-unlock-data-not-found: Unlocking channel with ID %c failed because it was never locked (which is weird to beginn with).
main.migrate-start: Migration from %o to %m started... Please do not stop the bot

help.bot-info-description: This Bot was developed by the [SC Network](https://sc-network.net)-Team and some [Open-Source-Contributors](https://github.com/SCNetwork/CustomDCBot/graphs/contributors) and self-hosted by the end-user.
help.stats-content:
Active modules: %am
Registered commands: %rc
Last restart: %lr
Last reload: %lrl

reload.reloaded-config:
Configuration reloaded successfully.
Out of %totalModules modules, %enabled were enabled, %configDisabled were disabled because their configuration was wrong.
reload.reload-failed: Configuration reloaded failed. Bot shutting down.
reload.reload-successful-syncing-commands: Configuration reloaded successfully, syncing commands, to make sure permissions are up-to-date...
reload.reload-failed-message:
**FAILED**
```%r```
**Please read your log to find more information**
The bot will kill itself now, bye :wave:

config.done-with-checking: Done with checking. Out of %totalModules modules, %enabled were enabled, %configDisabled were disabled because their configuration was wrong.
config.creating-file: Config %m/%f does not exist - I'm going to create it, please stand by...
config.checking-of-field-failed: An error occurred while checking the content of field "%fieldName" in %m/%f
config.moduleconf-regeneration: Regenerating module configuration, no settings will be overwritten, don't worry.
config.channel-not-found: Channel with ID "%id" could not be found
config.channel-not-on-guild: Channel with ID "%id" is not on your guild
config.role-not-found: Role with ID "%id" could not be found on your guild

helpers.you-did-not-run-this-command: You did not run this command. If you want to use the buttons, try running the command yourself
helpers.toggle-data-fetch-error: SC Network Release: Toggle-Data could not be fetched
helpers.toggle-data-fetch: SC Network Release: Toggle-Data fetched successfully

command.startup: The bot is currently starting up. Please try again in a few minutes
command.autcomplete-execution-failed: Execution of auto-complete on command /%c %g %s with option %f failed: %e
command.execution-failed-message:
**üî¥ Command execution failed üî¥**
This is not intended and can have multiple reasons.

The bot reported this issue, if this feature isn't disabled in the configuration, to the bot-developer. No further actions are required from your part. If the developer has some follow-up-questions and you are a member of the [SC Network Discord](<https://sc-net.work/dc>), the may reach out to you.
command.error-giving-role: An error occurred when trying to giving to give your your roles ):
command.module-disabled: This command is part of the "%m" which is disabled. This can either be intended by the server-admins (and slash-commands haven't synced yet) or this could be caused by a configuration error. Please check (or ask the admins) to check the bot's configuration and logs for details.

admin-tools.category-can-not-have-category: A Category can not have a category
admin-tools.not-category: Can not change category of channel to a not category channel
admin-tools.command-description: Execute some actions for admins via commands
admin-tools.movechannel-description: See the position of a channel or change the position of a channel
admin-tools.moverole-description: See the position of a role or change the position of a role
admin-tools.setcategory-description: Sets the category of a channel
admin-tools.channel-description: Channel on which this action should be executed
admin-tools.role-description: Role on which this action should be executed
admin-tools.emoji-too-much-data: Please **only** enter one emoji and nothing else
admin-tools.stealemote-description: Steals a emote from another server

birthdays.sync-error: [birthdays] %u's state was set to "sync", but there was no syncing candidate, so I disabled the synchronization
birthdays.no-birthday-set: You don't currently have a registered birthday on this server. If you have autoSync enabled, it could take up to 24 hours to be synchronized on every server. [Learn more about birthday synchronization](<https://docs.sc-network.net/de/dashboard/birthday-sync-faq>).
birthdays.birthday-status: Your birthday is currently set to **%dd.%mm%yyyy**%age%syncstatus
birthdays.your-age: which means that you are **%age%** old
birthdays.sync-on: Your birthday is being synced via your [SC Network Account](https://sc-network.net/dashboard).
birthdays.sync-off: Your birthday is set locally on this server and will not be synchronized
birthdays.no-sync-account: It seems like you either don't have an [SC Network Account](<https://sc-network.net/dashboard>) or you haven't entered any information about your birthday in it yet.
birthdays.auto-sync-on:
It seems that you have autoSync in your [SC Network Account](<https://sc-network.net/dashboard>) enabled. This means that your birthday will be synchronized all the time on every server. [Learn more](<https://docs.sc-network.net/de/dashboard/birthday-sync-faq#ich-kann-meinen-geburtstag-nicht-mehr-manuell-auf-einem-server-setzen>).
Your birthday isn't showing up? It can take up to 24 hours (usually it's less than two hours) for it to be synced, so stay calm and wait just a bit longer.
birthdays.enabled-sync: Successfully set. The synchronization is now enabled :+1:
birthdays.disabled-sync: Successfully set. The synchronization is disabled, you can now change or remove your birthday from this server.
birthdays.delete-but-sync-is-on: You currently have sync enabled. Please disable sync to delete your birthday.
birthdays.only-sync-allowed: This server only allows synchronization of your birthday with a [SC Network Account](<https://sc-network.net/dashboard>)
birthdays.against-tos: You have to be at least 13 years old to use Discord. Please read Discord's [Terms of Service](<https://discord.com/tos>) and if you are under the age of 13 please [delete your account](<https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/212500837-How-do-I-permanently-delete-my-account->) to comply with Discord's [Terms of Service](<https://discord.com/tos>) and wait %waitTime (or for the age for your country, listed [here](<https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/360040724612-Why-is-Discord-asking-for-my-birthday->)) years before creating a new account.
birthdays.too-old: It seems like you are too old to be alive
birthdays.command-description: Change, edit and see your birthday
birthdays.status-command-description: Shows the current status of your birthday
birthdays.sync-command-description: Manage the synchronization on this server
birthdays.sync-command-action-description: Action which should be performed on your synchronization
birthdays.delete-command-description: Deletes your birthday from this server
birthdays.migration-happening: Database-Schema not up-to-date. Migration database... This could take a while. Do not restart your bot to avoid data loss.
birthdays.migration-done: Successfully migrated database to newest version.

giveaways.required-messages-user: Have at least %mc new messages (%um/%mc messages)
giveaways.roles-required: Must have one of this roles to enter: %r
giveaways.gmessages-description: See your messages for a giveaway
giveaways.no-giveaways-for-reroll: They are no currently running giveaways. Maybe you are looking for /reroll?
giveaways.select-giveaway-to-end: Please select the giveaway which you want to end.
giveaways.gmanage-channel-description: Channel to start the giveaway in
giveaways.gmanage-winnercount-description: Count of winners that should be selected
giveaways.gmanage-requiredmessages-description: Count of new (!) messages that a user needs to have before entering
giveaways.gmanage-requiredroles-description: Role that user need to have to enter the giveaway
giveaways.gmanage-sponsor-description: Sets a different giveaway-starter, useful if you have a sponsor
giveaways.gmanage-sponsorlink-description: Link to a sponsor if applicable
giveaways.gereroll-winnercount-description: How many new winners there should be

levels.leaderboard-channel-not-found: Leaderboard-Channel not found or wrong type
levels.no-user-on-leaderboard: Can't generate a leaderboard, because no one has any XP which is odd, but that's how it is ¬Ø\_(„ÉÑ)_/¬Ø
levels.leaderboard-command-description: Shows the leaderboard of this guild
levels.profile-command-description: Shows the profile of you or an an user
levels.profile-user-description: User to see the profile from (default: you)
levels.please-send-a-message: Please send some messages before I can show you some data
levels.leaderboard-button-answer: Hi, %name, you are currently on **level %l** with **%ux**/%nx **XP**. Learn more with `/profile`.
levels.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-user-xp: Okay, do you really want to screw with %u? If you hate them so much, feel free to run `/manage-levels reset-xp confirm:True user:%ut` to run this irreversible action.
levels.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-server-x: Do you really want to delete all XP and Levels from this server? This action is irreversible and everyone on this server will hate you. Decided that it's worth it? Enter `/manage-levels reset-xp confirm:True`
levels.user-deleted-users-xp: %t deleted the XP of the user with id %u
levels.deleted-server-xp: %u deleted the XP of all users
levels.successfully-deleted-all-xp-of-users: Successfully deleted all the XP of all users
levels.cheat-no-profile: This user doesn't have a profile (yet), please force them to write a message before trying to betrayal your community by manipulating level scores.
levels.abuse-detected: %u wanted to use their privileges to their own benefit by manipulating their own XP. This is obviously abuse, I expect disciplinary measures to be taken against this user.
levels.cant-change-your-level-1: Wait... you are joking right? You aren't, right? You are serious... I am very disappointed of you, %un... I though you were a honest and fair admin, but as I can see today, you aren't. You wanted to use this command for your own benefit and betray all users on your server. I am honestly very very disappointed of you, I was expecting more from you. I will have to report this incidence to your supervisor and - as I said - I am very disappointed and frankly - if I had had the permission to - would have banned you from this server, because this incident proves that you wanted to abuse your privileges for your own benefit.
levels.cant-change-your-level-2: And you are trying again... This is very very sad, I am going to report you another time and want to stretch again that this is obviously abuse of your privileges. Have a nice day.
levels.successfully-changed: Successfully edited the XP of this user. Remember, every change you make destroys the experience of other users on this server as the levelsystem isn't fair anymore.
levels.edit-xp-command-description: Manage the levels of your server
levels.reset-xp-description: Reset the XP of a user or of the whole server
levels.reset-xp-user-description: User to reset the XP from (default: whole server)
levels.reset-xp-confirm-description: Do you really want to delete the data?
levels.edit-xp-user-description: User to be edited (can *not* be you!)
levels.edit-xp-value-description: New XP value of the user
levels.edit-xp-description: Betrays your community and edits a user's XP
levels.random-messages-enabled-but-non-configur: You have random messages enabled, but have non configured. Ignoring config.randomMessages configuration.
levels.granted-rewards-audit-log: Updated roles to make sure, they have the level role they need

partner-list.could-not-give-role: Could not give role to user %u
partner-list.could-not-remove-role: Could not remove role from user %u
partner-list.partner-not-found: Partner could not be found. Please check if you are using the right partner-ID. The partner-ID is not identical with the server-id of the partner. partner-list.channel-not-found: Could not find channel with ID %c or the channel has a wrong type (only text-channels supported)
partner-list.no-partners:
There are currently no partners. This is odd, but that's how it is ¬Ø\_(„ÉÑ)_/¬Ø

To add a partner, run `/partner add` as a slash-command.
partner-list.command-description: Manages the partner-list on this server
partner-list.padd-category-description: Please select one of the categories specified in your configuration

suggestions.manage-suggestion-comment-description: Explain why you made this choice

twitch-notifications.user-not-on-twitch: Could not find user %u on twitch

economy-system.message-drop-earned-money: The user %u gained %m %c by getting a message drop
economy-system.rob-earned-money: The user %u gained %m %c by robbing from %v
economy-system.weekly-earned-money: The user %u gained %m %c by cashing in their weekly reward
economy-system.daily-earned-money: The user %u gained %m %c by cashing in their weekly reward
economy-system.admin-self-abuse: The admin %a wanted to abuse their permissions by giving them self even more money! This can't and should not be ignored!
economy-system.admin-self-abuse-answer: What a bad admin you are, %u.  I'm disappointed with you! I need to report this. If I wish I could ban you!
economy-system.added-money: %i %c has been added to the balance of %u
economy-system.removed-money: %i %c has been removed from the balance of %u
economy-system.set-money: The balance of %v has been set to %i.
economy-system.added-money-log: The user %u added %i %c to the balance of %v
economy-system.removed-money-log: The user %u removed %i %c from the balance of %v
economy-system.set-money-log: The user %u set the %u's balance to %i %c
economy-system.command-description-crime: Earn some cash by committing a crime
economy-system.command-description-rob: Rob some cash from another user
economy-system.command-description-balance: Show the balance of a user
economy-system.command-description-add: Add some cash to a user
economy-system.command-description-remove: Remove some cash from a user
economy-system.message-drop: Message-Drop: You earned %m %c simply by chatting!
economy-system.created-item: The user %u has created a new shop item: %i
economy-system.delete-item: The user %u has deleted the shop item %i
economy-system.user-purchase: The user %u has purchased the shop item %i for %p.
economy-system.shop-command-description-add: Create a new item in the shop (admins only)
economy-system.shop-option-description-role: Role to give to users who buy the item
economy-system.shop-command-description-list: List all items in the shop
economy-system.shop-command-description-delete: Remove an item from the shop
economy-system.channel-not-found: Can't find the leaderboard channel with the ID %c
